overview: Fasten your seatbelt and prepare to experience the explosive world of Spiritually-Enlightening Holy Hip Hop Ministry, Music and Entertainment Glorifying GOD!!! Director and producer Christopher Martin professionally known as 'Play' from the rap and acting duo Kid 'n Play is the feature's host and invites you to meet some of Holy Hip Hop's trail blazin artists and Ministers of the Gospel, who are a part of a movement that began in the late 1980's and thrives today worldwide as one of the fastest growing music genres today, with over 2000 active emcees and thousands of fans worldwide
title: Holy Hip Hop
